title: Sample, ca. 1949
dimensions:
H x W (sample): 21 x 15.9 cm (8 1/4 x 6 1/4 in.)

creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Plain weave of black and white boucle with synthetic gold. Warp is black boucle alternating with two-ply black yarn. Weft is textured white and gold yarn alternating with flat gold paired with wrapped gold thread.
